title: One, two, three
creator_credit: Billy Wilder, Pyramid Films, United Artists Corporation and Mirsch
brief_description: James Cagney shines in a virtuoso, verbal machine-gun fire perfomance as an American executive trying to sell Coca Cola to the Russians while preventing his boss’s daughter from marrying an East-German communist. How the would-be groom is converted into a capitalist before her parents arrive is part of this first-class farce.
